text: Britain's Next Top Model, Cycle 3 is the third season of Britain's Next Top Model. This cycle includes 12 contestants. The winner was 18-year-old Lauren McAvoy. ==Contestants== (ages stated are at time of contest) Contestant Age Hometown Outcome Dani Lawrence 20 Durham, England Eliminated in Episode 1 Krystal Hancock 22 South Wales, Wales Eliminated in Episode 2 Abigail Galatia 19 Cornwall, England Eliminated in Episode 3 Natalie Nwagbo 22 London, England Eliminated in Episode 4 Holly Alexander 19 Glasgow, Scotland Eliminated in Episode 5 Carly Thompson 18 Plymouth, England Eliminated in Episode 6 Sherece Campbell 24 Sheffield, England Eliminated in Episode 7 Lucy Bennett 20 Cheltenham, England Eliminated in Episode 8 Stefanie Webber 20 Chelsea, England Eliminated in Episode 9 Rebecca White 19 Manchester, England Eliminated in Episode 10 Louise Watts 20 Essex, England Runner-up Lauren McAvoy 20 Wickford, Essex, England Winner ==Prizes== * A modeling contract with Models 1 * A contarct with Ruby & Millie Cosmetics * A cover and spread in Company Magazine ==Episodes== 1\. *Best: Lucy Benett *Worst: Abigail Galatia & Dani Lawrence *Eliminated: Dani Lawrence 2\. *Best: Rebecca White *Worst: Krystal Hancok & Carly Thompson *Eliminated: Krystal Hancok 3\. *Best: Louise Watts *Worst: Stefanie Webber & Abigail Galatia *Eliminated: Abigail Galatia 4\. *Best: Carly Thompson *Worst: Lauren McAvoy & Natalie Nwagbo *Eliminated: Natalie Nwagbo 5\. *Best: Stefanie Webber *Worst: Holly Alexander Richie & Carly Thompson *Eliminated: Holly Alexander Richie 6\. *Best: Rebecca White *Worst: Louise Watts & Carly Thompson *Eliminated: Carly Thompson 7\. *Best: Louise Watts *Worst: Stefanie Webber & Sherece Champell *Eliminated: Sherece Champell 8\. *Best: Rebecca White *Worst: Lucy Benett & Louise Watts *Eliminated: Lucy Benett 9\. *Best: Louise Watts *Worst: Lauren McAvoy & Stefanie Webber *Eliminated: Stefanie Webber 10\. *Best: Louise Watts *Worst: Lauren McAvoy & Rebecca White *Eliminated: Rebecca White *Final Two: Lauren McAvoy & Louise Watts *Winner: Lauren McAvoy Category:Britain's Next Top Model
title: Britain's Next Top Model, Cycle 3
